<xf:macro id="forum_page_options" arg-forum="!" arg-thread="">
	<xf:page option="forum" value="{$forum}" />

	<xf:if is="{$thread}">
		<xf:page option="searchConstraints" value="{{ {
			phrase('threads'): {'search_type': 'post'},
			phrase('this_forum'): {'search_type': 'post', 'c': {'nodes': [$forum.node_id], 'child_nodes': 1}},
			phrase('this_thread'): {'search_type': 'post', 'c': {'thread': $thread.thread_id}}
		} }}" />
	<xf:else />
		<xf:page option="searchConstraints" value="{{ {
			phrase('threads'): {'search_type': 'post'},
			phrase('this_forum'): {'search_type': 'post', 'c': {'nodes': [$forum.node_id], 'child_nodes': 1}}
		} }}" />
	</xf:if>
</xf:macro>

<xf:ad position="forum_overview_top" /> <xf:widgetpos id="forum_overview_top" />
<xf:pageaction> <xf:if is="$pageSelected == 'new_posts' "> <xf:button href="{{ link('forums/list') }}" icon="list"> {{ phrase('forum_list') }} </xf:button> <xf:else /> <xf:button href="{{ $xf.options.forumsDefaultPage == 'new_posts' ? link('forums/new-posts') : link('whats-new/posts') }}" icon="bolt"> {{ phrase('new_posts') }} </xf:button> </xf:if> <xf:if is="$xf.visitor.canCreateThread() OR $xf.visitor.canCreateThreadPreReg()"> <xf:button href="{{ link('forums/create-thread') }}" class="button--cta" icon="write" overlay="true" rel="nofollow"> {{ phrase('post_thread...') }} </xf:button> </xf:if> </xf:pageaction>
{$innerContent|raw}

property.title: Dynamic avatar text size (%)
property.description: Using a value between 0 and 100, this represents the approximate height of a dynamic avatar text character as a percentage of avatar.

property.title: Border color
property.description: Structural borders around blocks of content generally use this color

property.title: Alternate content background color
property.description: In order to differentiate it, some content will be presented on this alternate background

property.title: Highlighted content background color
property.description: When the standard background color is highlighted or selected, it will use this color

property.title: Page background color
property.description: The background of the page itself, on which all other content rests

property.title: Public logo height
property.description: If you specify the height of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.

property.title: Logo URL
property.description: The path from your XenForo root directory to your logo. If you specify alternate variations, they should be the same size. If you specify an SVG, you should set Emails > Email logo URL to a PNG, or similar, for better compatibility.

property.title: Public logo width
property.description: If you specify the width of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.
